test.question: Which of the following best describes a keyboard shortcut?

options.A: A single key that performs all computer functions
options.B: A combination of keys that performs a specific function
options.C: A mouse action that opens a hidden menu
options.D: A password for accessing a computer

answer.B: A combination of keys that performs a specific function

test.question: On a Windows computer, which key combination is used to paste copied content?
On a Mac, what is the equivalent shortcut for Undo (Windows: Ctrl + Z)?
Which modifier key is used to open the Start Menu on Windows?
Why do keyboard shortcuts boost productivity?

options.A: They make the keyboard glow in the dark
options.B: They minimize the time spent using the mouse
options.D: They replace the need for typing altogether

answer.B: They minimize the time spent using the mouse
